title: (4303) Brand New 2 Stored House For Sale, Bokundara Piliyandala
details: Brand New 2 Stored House for Sale, Bokundara Piliyandala Road. 4 Large Bed Rooms, Master Bedroom With Attached Bath, AC Landscaped, 2 Cars Can Be Parked. Double height Space Living Area, Mohogany Pantry, Hot Water, Garage, Remote Gate, Rs : 178 ( Negotiable ) 17.8 Million
